text: @ArmchairArab @misrati_free we are considering a major solution for the garbage for the whole country not just Tripoli.
A very nice experience to share with national and foreign professional soccer players and to practice a few minutes of sports.
@ Outside502 thank you very much. It was nice to be able to play with great players and in this way to promote unity in our society, greetings.
@Oswa_g thank you very much Oswaldo, it is important to play sports to keep us physically and mentally healthy, greetings.
@ GabyM90 thank you very much, the experience of sharing with such great national and international players was very beautiful.
@PamelaPaz_ I like football, and having played with excellent people was a pleasant experience, a hug.
My participation in the game was to encourage the population to play sports and join us to participate in the #HambreCero program
@SindyluGT good evening Sindy, I'm going to Real Madrid.
@ marpadilla1 Thanks Marisol, I like to practice sports, and what better than a football game with good players, a hug.
@maritza_santis it is important that young people do sport, it is a healthy way of recreation and that it takes them away from gangs.
@DjPullandPhone You have to do different things to promote positive attitudes in Guatemala, greetings.
@CharlieHelias thank you very much Charlie, as always a pleasure to say hello again, happy night.
Thank you very much to everyone for writing me I was able to read them and I am pleased to have contagioned them with a positive attitude, good evening to everyone.
@ khrys_7girard Real Madrid, good evening.

I wanted to tell President Komorowski my position on the major European issues. #Poland # FH2012
I want to involve all European countries in the economic governance of the Union. #Poland # FH2012
I explained to the President that I wanted to renegotiate the European Treaty to add the missing dimension. #Poland # FH2012
The treaty lacks a component on growth, the development of major joint projects, financial instruments such as Eurobonds.
I wish to affirm here my attachment to the links between France and Poland. # FH2012 cc @Leszek_Miller http://t.co/GcRehOIx

To the press that questions me, I explain that all the European partners are respectful of the vote of the French. #Poland # FH2012
There is a real European will on my part. #Poland # FH2012
I will plead, I will act for the renegotiation of the European Treaty, the partners know it. I'm not hiding anything. #Poland # FH2012
My heartfelt condolences to the family of the outstanding writer and professor Luz Méndez de la Vega. http://t.co/KOaN1pUC

Epa friend Hector Navarro! Epa my brother Argenis and all the workers of Corpoelec, how wonderful the progress of those works for my people!
Excellent explanation! Very good pedagogyRevolutionary! We shielded all ofVenezuela! Now, yes, we have aNationalElectricSystem!

We must restore confidence in the European ideal! #Poland # FH2012
Ay Mérida bella! How I love that land! Go my immense love to the great Merideño town, to its History, to its Sierra Nevada, to its AguilasBlancas!

Barinas, Barinas, Barineando I'm happy from Havana! Long live the Llanera Homeland! Go all my deepest desires to the Balearic People!
Oh my old Elena! My old Hugo, I am seeing you and I ask you for your wonderful blessing! Viva Barinas!
That Governor Adam! A hug brother. And to the Mayors and the PSUV and the GP Patriotic! A lot of unity in the battle! Soon I will be with you!

@LucyMbabazi. Urakoze,nawe kandi!
No cover or umbrella over one's head when it comes to the health and nutrition of a citizen
I am sad to learn of Jean Giraud's disappearance. Draftsman and scriptwriter, he was above all a craftsman of dreams.
Food for the people! House well equipped for Venezuelan families! That makes me very happy! Blessed are the peoples
That's socialism: cheap food, equipment for the home, for LivingLiving! Live the food fairs! We will live and we will come!
What a beautiful activity, Marco Torres! A hug to the brave Carabobeño people and the brave soldiers of the Valencia Garrison!
There I feel, in the very heart of that heroic Patriot Youth! Let's go guys! Come on girls! Building the Socialist Homeland!
At the Jean Jaurès gymnasium in Paris with my ultramarine friends, for a big gathering! cc @VictorinLurel # FH2012 http://t.co/ognqVDrA
Before I give my speech in a few minutes, here are my commitments for Overseas: http://t.co/u8GaXMoP # FH2012
I want to greet affectionately @BertrandDelanoe, Mayor of Paris, who is also, Mayor of one of the largest cities of # Outremer! # FH2012
France is proud of all its multiplicities, France is proud of its miscegenation. #Outremer # FH2012
The France I love is the one that is able to make everyone live together. #Outremer # FH2012
The French Republic is one, indivisible and secular. #Outremer # FH2012
The Republic does not fear diversity, because diversity is life, movement. Uniformity is forgetting. #Outremer # FH2012
There is no place in the Republic for the race. I will ask Parliament to remove the word race from our Constitution. #Overseas
This word has taken on a different meaning today. We only know one race, one family, the human family. #Outremer # FH2012
Slavery is a crime against humanity, an affront to the dignity of every human being. #Outremer # FH2012
Our fight is against inequalities, but also against indignities. #Outremer # FH2012
The republican promise is first of all that of equality. This raises the question of territorial continuity. #Outremer # FH2012
I commit myself that the prices of the communications between the hexagon and the #Outremer are aligned with those in hexagon. # FH2012
The interministerial delegation for equal opportunities will become competent to fight against discrimination. #Outremer # FH2012
6 weeks of promises will not erase 5 years of inertia. I will relaunch the project of the city of #Outremer in Paris. # FH2012
This city of #Outremer will be a place of expression of cultures. A living place, open to all. # FH2012
At school, local language classes will be offered. #Outremer # FH2012
I took 30 commitments for #Outremer, http://t.co/RxvySG4r, in addition to my 60 proposals. # FH2012
The fight against unemployment, the # 1 scourge of #Outremer: 60% of young people are unemployed. # FH2012
Credits to finance supported jobs were divided by 10. #Outremer # FH2012
It is justice that summarizes the project I present to the French. #Outremer # FH2012
I know the #Outremer well, I have friends everywhere, and those who are not my friends do not know me yet! # FH2012
France is a big archipelago! #Outremer # FH2012
Do not be afraid, do not be impressed by anything! #Outremer # FH2012
Respect the campaign, do not dread anything except polemics, outrages, overbid. #Outremer # FH2012
I call for the highest possible participation, and I warn of the temptation to anger the extreme vote. #Overseas
We must give all the French who are watching us the pride of being at the rendezvous of history. #Outremer # FH2012
It is we who must set the example and straighten the country! #Outremer # FH2012
April 22 must be a first round that allows us to be as high as possible in the second round. #Outremer # FH2012
I owe you this victory that you have been waiting for so long. A victory for the Republic, a victory for France. # FH2012
Come on, Elias! Come on, glorious youth! Since my convalescence, I send you my whole heart and my commitment to life and to Victoria!
Yesterday I talked with Fidel a long time. I told him about this march of the Youth today. And he asked me to tell you how much he admires them. VivaFidel!
I entrust you a lot of study, a lot of conscience, a lot of organization, a lot of unity! Irreverence in the discussion, loyalty in action!
Go metro by metro, inch by inch, house by house, convincing everyone, incorporating them all! Let no one stay out of this Battle!
Well, finally, in spite of everything, you make me feel like Trivia, like the Spider, like the Cadet of 40 years ago! God bless you!
After today's big gathering, I meet the ultramarine Parisian associations. #Outremer # FH2012 http://t.co/9iCtJGDi
You must become aware of your strength in the Republic. #Outremer # FH2012
To all the Doctors of the Nation, my sincere congratulatory words go in their day! We will guarantee integral health to all the People!

You know I visited a historic Tunisia last week. http://t.co/lojy3fqn
In fact, friendship between the mağrı countries and Turkey is so strong that they are the common symbols of our red and white, moon and star flags.
It was the Ottomans who protected all the mağrı countries from the fate of Andalusia. The Turks become the lakes of the Mediterranean with the support of ...
brought. For 400 years, the memories and prosperity of this association and the pride of Tunisia makes us very happy.
The Tunisian leaders who started the Arab Spring for the first time and carried out the democracy revolution on January 14, all suffered from persecution and persecution.
... although there were people who saw them, their dignified positions affected us all.
In the photo, the cape of the president, Merzuki, comes from the left tradition, in the struggle for human rights in the Arab world ... http://t.co/ByytVE06
... is a known doctor and his life has been in custody for many years. I shake hands with the Interior Minister Ennahda Party's Seyit Ali ...
... who has spent 17 years in prison for torture. I have listened to many stories about torture he once drew.
In the photo Ennahda Party Prime Minister Hammadi Jibali is in prison for 17 years, 14 of them in cell. http://t.co/zlrl2opq
When I looked at his attitude of maturity and tolerance, it seemed that he had never been in prison.
All of these are just because of political considerations.
Rashid Ghannouchi, one of the main leaders of the revolution, is a thinker and philosopher. He has been working with the Sudanese ... http://t.co/JsUHTAXj
... the leadership gives great assurance about the future of Tunisia. I have known him for a long time, and I value him very much.
He lived for 20 years after years of imprisonment.
I made a speech in the Tunisian National Assembly. They listened to me with great enthusiasm and enthusiasm. http://t.co/qymca4zl
Parliament Speaker Mustafa bin Cafer is also a respected person who has resisted wrongs in the most difficult times.
Sadıki College I visited is the same as our Galatasaray High School. http://t.co/kktgfeyt
It was founded in 1875 by Hayrettin Pasha and trained Tunisian intellectuals and statesmen for a long time. http://t.co/wtcfg0g3
Hayrettin Pasha, who appears in the picture hanging on the wall in this photo I'm with our MPs in the delegation. http://t.co/9fkvbtjj
He was an Ottoman pasha known for his reformist qualities and made the Grand Vizier of Sultan Abdülhamit.
I chatted with the students at this school. One of the girls in Tunisia says that Turkic is the language of choice in schools ... http://t.co/yB0TzZZw
... the prompt was very striking. The Minister of National Education of Tunisia, who was in his hometown, looked at it positively.
Rashid Ghannouchi and a lady at a closed bazaar while going to the Friday prayer surprise us ... http://t.co/DXXZAFEY
... his family once came from Kayseri.

It is in Iran and in the Gulf that lies our greatest concern. #Defense # FH2012
The door must remain open for dialogue in order to find a way out of this crisis. #Iran #Defense # FH2012
82 soldiers died for France in Afghanistan. #Defense # FH2012
My thoughts are with their families and all the wounded, we will not forget them. #Afghanistan #Defense # FH2012
If the French give me responsibility, France will withdraw its troops from Afghanistan. #Defense # FH2012
I make the commitment to set a course for our defense strategy. #Defense # FH2012
Europe of defense has been so often hoped, it must take a new dimension. #Defense # FH2012
I want political alternation in France to be an opportunity for a revival of European defense. #Defense # FH2012
I also want to mention the Atlantic alliance: it is a guarantee of our security. #Defense # FH2012
The outgoing President decided at the beginning of his mandate to return to NATO's integrated command. #Defense # FH2012
France has obtained no convincing benefit. I want to make an assessment of this position of France. #OTAN #Defense # FH2012
I hope that the drafting of a white paper on our national defense will begin as soon as possible. #Defense # FH2012
I want to consolidate our nuclear deterrence. It is the life insurance of our country against the threat of proliferation. #Defense
Rationalization measures will be carried out, without pretense and without artifice. #Defense # FH2012
I will support the role of SMEs in the field of defense. Their dynamism makes them a valuable technological reservoir. #Defense # FH2012
I will restore a balanced functioning of the public service in the field of defense. #Defense # FH2012
It will be up to the President-elect to restore a coherence adapted to this great sovereign function. #Defense # FH2012
I want to remind you that our armies are the first recruiters of young people from 18 to 25 years old. #Defense # FH2012

Overtime can not be a solution whereas hiring in the company may be possible. #Capital # FH2012

VAT is the most unfair tax. #Capital # FH2012
If the French give me their confidence, what will be said will be done. And that will be a break! #Capital # FH2012

It is unacceptable that funds in Europe continue to speculate against the value of our currency. #Capital # FH2012
